title: SMC_GroupAcceptsMovements (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SMC_GroupAcceptsMovements : BOOL
Returns whether the
AxisGroup
will immediately accept
a non-aborting movement command, i.e. whether the movement
function block will immediately report CommandAccepted.
Note
A return value of
TRUE
means that at least
one non-aborting movement can be accepted.  If there are movements
already waiting to be accepted, it is only guaranteed that
the movement with the lowest MovementId will be accepted.
After a movement function block reports CommandAccepted,
this function can be called again to check whether another
movement can be accepted.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes
